message: Take it or leave it, Bob. You get a dollar, or you get nothing.
You're not getting all the money, Alice. You can't have it all!
Bob, I'm willing to compromise.  Let's split it 90/10 this time. You're getting less, but at least you're getting something. We can't keep fighting over this forever!
You're not willing to give me a fair share, so I'll take 75% and leave you with 25%

Bob, we're getting closer to the end. Let's make a deal. 70/30 split this time. I'm willing to give you more than before, but we need to end this.  If we keep going, the value of the money will continue to decrease for both of us.
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'll take 2/3 and leave you with 1/3, but don't think this is the last offer I'll make

Bob, we are running out of time. I'm willing to give you 40% of the money, but we need to reach an agreement soon.  If we keep going, the value of the money will be worth almost nothing.  It's time to compromise.
You're not getting any younger, Alice. I'll take 55.56% and leave you with 44.44%, but don't think I'm getting soft
Bob, we're down to the wire.  Let's split it 50/50.  We both get something, and it's better than getting nothing at all.  We need to end this before inflation eats away the entire pot!
